channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: URGENT PUBLIC HEALTH INCIDENT: Vile faeces smell from overflowing drain pipe burst, 20th September
item.description:
A unbearable smell is coming from this waste pipe burst. Overflowing onto the pathway. Please also contact Thames Water. The same thing happened 2 weeks ago and nothing was done to fix it. Now pigeons are bathing in it and spreading disease around. Please fix with urgency, this has been like this for days now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wentworth Crescent, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unhealthy tree, 20th September
item.description:
This particular tree between 22 and 24 is showing signs of decay in the form dark, sunken and cracked areas which could suggest canker disease as well as some sections of the bark look as if theyâ€™re dying and peeling back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Meadowview, Blackfen, London

item.title: Noise 24hrs from loose gas cover in road - still not fixed, 20th September
item.description:
The gas cover in the road makes a very loud noise when traffic passes over it which is especially disturbing when residents are trying to sleep. THIS WAS FIRST REPORTED VIA FIX MY STREET ON 31 AUGUST BUT HAS STILL NOT BEEN REPAIRED.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Endymion Road, Stroud Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
